html:
We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products‚Äîlearn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission.

The Brand Builders Summit: Brand X-pedition is a free four-day virtual x-perience dedicated to empowering brand builders with the tools, knowledge, and strategies to master the craft of building stellar brands!

What to Expect

üåü STELLAR KEYNOTES
24+ Keynotes
Experience cosmic presentations packed with stellar insights and real-world strategies for growth.

‚ú® ASK THE STARS
24+ Live Q&A Sessions
Get expert answers and real-time guidance to your branding challenges from the best in the galaxy.

üåå GALACTIC ROUNDTABLES
2+ Live Expert Panels
Join intergalactic conversations with leading branding pioneers and apply their strategies to your work.

üöÄ BOOSTER WORKSHOPS
3+ Interactive Workshops
Participate in star-powered sessions to unlock creative breakthroughs and strengthen your brand-building skills.

ü§ù SYNERGY SESSIONS
2+ Networking & Co-Working Events
Forge powerful alliances, share insights, and collaborate with peers to accelerate your success.

üí´ COSMIC BOUNTY
Prizes & Bonuses
Win exclusive resources, bonuses, and galactic rewards to fuel your journey and level up your brand.

When, Where & Price

  • Date: September 16‚Äì19, 2025
  • Tickets Available: August, 2025
  • Location: Online ‚Äì Join from anywhere in the world!
  • Price: Free
  • Optional Upgrade:The Star Pass ($97) unlocks lifetime access, bonus content, exclusive tools, and over $4000 in resources.

Who is This For?

  • Creative Business Owners striving to attract and retain more clients.
  • Brand Strategists looking to refine their strategic approaches.
  • Designers aiming to create standout brand identities.
  • Marketing Professionals seeking innovative growth tactics.
  • Entrepreneurs wanting to elevate their brand‚Äôs market presence.

Why Attend?

  • Become a star brand builder & brighten your future with workshops, expert panels, and interactive sessions.
  • Learn the latest in brand strategy, design, growth, and business tactics from top professionals.
  • Gain exclusive insights from over 28+ branding pioneers

How to Participate?

  1. Get on the waitlist to get notified once tickets are available
  2. Optionally upgrade to the Star Pass for extended access, exclusive bonuses and access to our live sessions. This will be available after registering for your free ticket, released in late August.
  3. Engage with the community: Join our private community of branding experts and fellow attendees.

Outcomes of Attending

  • Enhanced Branding Skills: Learn proven frameworks and creative techniques.
  • Networking Opportunities: Connect with global brand professionals.
  • Practical Tools: Acquire strategies to scale your brand and boost market reach.
  • Business Growth: Master essential business skills to attract and retain clients.

Tracks¬†

  • Design: Creative techniques for developing unique visuals & brand identities.
    Includes brand design, logos, packaging, web, motion, print, and more.
  • Strategy:¬† Frameworks, tools and processes to refine your strategic approach.
  • Marketing: Tactics to scale your brand and expand market presence.
  • Business : Business skills to elevate your brand‚Äôs success.

Schedule¬†

Full schedule announced September.

Special Features

  • Free 48-Hour Access: Free registration provides limited-time access to each presentation.
  • Exclusive Content: The Star Pass upgrade offers extended access and $3000+ of exclusive bonuses.
  • Community Engagement: Network with speakers and attendees through a private platform.
  • Bonuses & Prizes: Thousands of dollars of prizes being given away!


Stellar Feedback (23,000+ Brand Builders | Rated 9.7/10)

Our inaugural 2024 Summit was a cosmic success, attracting over 23,000 brand builders from 150+ countries around the globe and earning an astronomical 9.7/10 satisfaction rating.

What Attendees Said:

‚ÄúLearned more about branding in a week than I did in a semester of college.‚Äù

‚ÄúHighly recommended, even if you don‚Äôt have a brand or business yet. You‚Äôll learn valuable insights and meet designers from all over the world.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe Brand Builders Summit completely transformed my process of building a brand. I can‚Äôt wait for the next one ‚Äî it was an amazing opportunity!‚Äù

‚ÄúThank you for organizing such a great summit! It was clear how much effort went into making it happen. Please keep me updated on future events.‚Äù

‚Äú100% would recommend the summit to a friend.‚Äù

‚Äî 2024 Summit Survey Results

30+ Speakers & Panelists (Announced Late August, 2025)

Our x-traordinary speakers are industry leaders who bring unparalleled x-pertise and insight from across the branding galaxy.

They‚Äôll share innovative strategies, proven techniques, and inspiring stories to help you build better brands and boost your career into orbit.

These are the voices shaping the future of branding and now, they‚Äôre here to guide your next move!

Speakers will be announced in late August.

Sponsors¬†

  • Brand Builders Alliance ‚Äì The ultimate community for brand builders
  • More announced soon. Interested in sponsoring? Contact us.


Upgrade to the Star Pass: Unlock Over $3,000+ in Bonuses and Resources!

While the event is free, upgrading to the Star Pass gives you extraordinary benefits:

  • Unlimited Access to Session Replays: Enjoy 24+ presentations and Q&A replays at your convenience.
  • Private Podcast: Access 10+ exclusive interviews with industry leaders.
  • Practical Live Lunch & Learns: Join three hands-on sessions to enhance your skills.
  • Live Expert Panels: Participate in three live discussions with top experts.
  • Networking & Co-Working Sessions: Connect and collaborate with fellow professionals.
  • Extraordinary Bonuses & Giveaways: Take advantage of special offers and contests.
  • Exclusive Speaker Resources: Gain over $3,000+ worth of tools, courses, and materials.

Valued at over $5000+, the Star Pass will be available for just $97!

Upgrade to the Star Pass after securing your free ticket to unlock these incredible resources and boost your career!

Don‚Äôt miss out ‚Äì Join The Waitlist¬†

Get on the waitlist so you grab your free ticket when it becomes available and join a community of brand builders dedicated to success!

See you there, brand builder!

About Jacob Cass

Jacob Cass is a brand designer &¬†strategist, educator, podcaster, business coach and the founder of JUST Creative, an award-winning branding & design consultancy that doubles as an industry-leading blog. Get in touch.
